Class ArberNativeExport

java.lang.Object
com.arbergashi.charts.core.nativeapi.ArberNativeExport
public final class ArberNativeExport extends Object
Native export surface for GraalVM shared library builds.

Handle-based, primitive-only API for native callers (Qt/Swift). Rendering requires a canvas handle registered by the host bridge.

Since:
2026-01-30
Version:
1.7.0
Author:
Arber Gashi
